tuv.seg: Tax on savings and investments
Cáin ar choigiltis agus infheistíochtaí
Employee share option schemes
Scéimeanna Scaireanna Fostaithe in Éirinn
Employees in Ireland can avail of certain share optionsfrom their company that may be "tax free" or "tax efficient"
In Éirinn, is féidir le fostaithe roghanna faoi leith scaireanna a ghlacadh óna gcomhlacht a d'fhéadfadh a bheith saor ó cháin nó cáin éifeachtúil
Find out about the two main ways an employee can benefit from shares in the company
Faigh amach faoin dá phríomhbhealach gur féidir le fostaí leas a bhaint as scaireanna ó chomhlacht
Deposit Interest Retention Tax
Cáin Choinneála ar Ús Taisce
If you earn interest on savings then you pay a tax on the interest called Deposit Interest Retention Tax (DIRT).Information about DIRT, who pays it and exemptions and reliefs
Má thuilleann tú ús ar choigilteas b'fhéidir go mbeidh ort cáin a íoc ar an ús sin ar a dtugtar Cáin Choinneála ar Ús Taisce

Universal Social Charge (USC)
Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch (MSU)
Introduction to income tax credits and reliefs
